hero.title: Stay Connected Worldwide, Global Data at Local Prices
hero.subtitle: Travel smarter with Bitcall’s ultra-affordable eSIM plans. Say goodbye to roaming charges and SIM card hassles. Whether you’re exploring new cities or working remotely, Bitcall offers instant eSIM activation with coverage in over 200 countries at local rates. No contracts, no hidden fees — just fast, reliable data wherever you go.

affordable.title: The Most Affordable eSIM on the Planet
affordable.description: Save up to 90% compared to traditional roaming fees. Bitcall’s prepaid eSIM plans let you know exactly what you pay upfront—no hidden charges. You’ll save money on every trip, leaving more for the things you love.

trusted.title: Trusted Connectivity, Anytime, Anywhere
trusted.description: Thousands of savvy travelers trust Bitcall to stay online abroad. We partner with top carriers worldwide to ensure fast, reliable 4G/5G speeds in over 200 countries.

flexible.title: Flexible Plans for Every Traveler
flexible.description: Whether you need just 1GB for a short trip or unlimited data for a month-long remote work stint, we’ve got you covered. Choose from local, regional, or global eSIM options, and only pay for what you need.

peaceOfMind.title: Travel with Peace of Mind
peaceOfMind.description: No contracts. No SIM card hunting. No worries. If your plans change, we’ve got you covered with a 6-month refund guarantee. Plus, our 24/7 customer support is always here to assist you, no matter where you are.

plans.title: Flexible Plans for Every Trip
plans.description: Choose a plan that suits your needs, from a weekend getaway to long-term remote work. Top up or change plans as needed.

howItWorks.title: How It Works? Get Online in 3 Easy Steps

step1.title: Choose Your Plan
step1.description: Select a plan that fits your trip. Choose from Local, Regional, or Global options. Pick how much data you need and the duration of your plan.

step2.title: Get Your eSIM Instantly
step2.description: After checkout, you’ll immediately receive a QR code and simple installation instructions via email. Just scan the code on your eSIM-compatible phone to install your Bitcall eSIM. No physical SIM card required.

step3.title: Activate & Go
step3.description: Once you land at your destination, your eSIM activates automatically. You’ll be online within seconds. Use your data for navigating, streaming, emailing, or staying connected with friends. Your physical SIM stays active for calls and SMS.

forWhom.title: Built for Digital Nomads, Travelers & Teams

users.nomads: Avoid local SIM hassles in each country. One eSIM covers your entire multi-country trip. Enjoy data as soon as you land, without searching for SIM vendors or Wi-Fi hotspots.
users.remoteWorkers: Work from anywhere with confidence. Bitcall offers affordable unlimited data plans, so you’ll always have a stable connection for video calls and file sharing.
users.teams: Bitcall is the perfect solution for employee travel. Managers can instantly purchase eSIM data for employees, saving on roaming fees and simplifying travel logistics.
